sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Form, Button, Modal, Nav, Toast, } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Booking.css"; const Booking = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", phone: "", checkIn: "", checkOut: "", roomType: "Standard Room - ₹1,999/night", guests: "2 Guests", requests: "", }); const [summary, setSummary] = useState({ nights: 0, roomPrice: 1999, roomCharges: 0, tax: 0, total: 0, }); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState("Card"); const [processing, setProcessing] = useState(false); const [showSuccessModal, setShowSuccessModal] = useState(false); const [showToast, setShowToast] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShowModal(false); const handleShow = () => setShowModal(true); // ✅ Calculate dynamic pricing useEffect(() => { const priceMap = { "Standard Room": 1999, "Deluxe Room": 2999, "Traditional Suite": 3499, "Premium Suite": 4999, "Family Room": 5999, "Royal Suite": 7999, }; const roomTypeName = formData.roomType.split("-")[0].trim(); const roomPrice = priceMap[roomTypeName] || 1999; const checkInDate = new Date(formData.checkIn); const checkOutDate = new Date(formData.checkOut); const diffTime = checkOutDate - checkInDate; const nights = diffTime > 0 ? diffTime / (1000 * 3600 * 24) : 0; const roomCharges = nights * roomPrice; const tax = roomCharges * 0.12; const total = roomCharges + tax; setSummary({ nights, roomPrice, roomCharges, tax, total }); }, [formData.checkIn, formData.checkOut, formData.roomType]); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setShowModal(true); }; const today = new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0]; // ✅ Payment Simulation Flow const handlePayment = () => { setProcessing(true); // Step 1: Show "Processing..." setTimeout(() => { setProcessing(false); setShowModal(false); // Step 2: Show Success Modal setShowSuccessModal(true); // Auto-close Success Modal after 10 seconds setTimeout(() => { setShowSuccessModal(false); // Step 3: Show Toast + Reset Form setShowToast(true); setFormData({ fullName: "", email: "", phone: "", checkIn: "", checkOut: "", roomType: "Standard Room - ₹1,999/night", guests: "2 Guests", requests: "", }); }, 10000); }, 2000); }; return ( <> {/* ================= Booking Form ================= */}

Book Your Stay

Fill in the details below to reserve your room at Maheshwari Nivas

Booking Details
{/* Personal Info */}
Personal Information
Full Name *
Email *
Phone Number *
{/* Stay Info */}
Stay Details
Check-in Date * Check-out Date * Room Type * Number of Guests * Special Requests
{/* Booking Summary */}
Booking Summary

Room Type

{formData.roomType.split("-")[0]}

Duration

{formData.checkIn && formData.checkOut ? `${new Date( formData.checkIn ).toLocaleDateString()} - ${new Date( formData.checkOut ).toLocaleDateString()}` : "—"} {summary.nights > 0 && ( <> {" "} ({summary.nights} night {summary.nights > 1 ? "s" : ""}) )}

Guests

{formData.guests}

Room Charges ₹{summary.roomCharges.toLocaleString()}
Taxes & Fees (12%) ₹{summary.tax.toLocaleString()}
Total Amount ₹{summary.total.toLocaleString()}
  • ✓ Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in
  • ✓ Complimentary breakfast included
  • ✓ Free WiFi & parking
{/* ================= Payment Modal ================= */} Complete Payment
Total Amount

₹{summary.total.toLocaleString()}

{/* Payment Tabs */}
setPaymentMethod(k)} className="mb-4 border-bottom-0" > 💳 Card 📱 UPI 🏦 Net Banking 💼 Wallet
{/* Card */} {paymentMethod === "Card" && (
Card Number Cardholder Name Expiry Date CVV

🔐 Your payment is secured with 256-bit SSL encryption.

)} {/* ✅ Success Modal */} setShowSuccessModal(false)} >
✅

Payment Successful!

Your booking has been confirmed. Thank you for choosing Maheshwari Nivas.

Amount Paid: ₹{summary.total.toLocaleString()}

Booking ID: MN- {Math.floor(100000 + Math.random() * 900000)}

This window will close automatically in 10 seconds.

{/* ✅ Bottom-right Toast */} setShowToast(false)} show={showToast} delay={5000} autohide className="position-fixed bottom-0 end-0 m-4 bg-success text-white" >

Payment Successful!


Your booking has been confirmed. Confirmation email sent.
); }; export default Booking;
